item.title: About
item.description: I am a Cloud Solutions Architect with the goal of helping people take advantage of cloud technologies provided by Azure and AWS. I have huge interests in learning, technology and science. You can learn more about me here. This blog is a place I occasionally try to write some thoughts on Cloud computing and related topics. I hope others find them useful, insightful, or just interesting. The blog is hosted using Github Pages.
